TopicTitle: Parachutes and fuel tanks slowly take off without command pod

Articles.Content:
I don't even have to launch. They automatically just slowly lift away and leave my command pod floating. I have never had this issue before. I'm running 64bit Workaround with quite a few mods. anybody else had an issue like this?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/l2gb0cp2cwhc6e5/output_log.txt?dl=0

here is a pic

http://imgur.com/pleMtBj

I know my chute is on the same stage as an engine but no matter how I have the staging it does the same thing. 

Also if I attempt to EVA it says "bailout!" In the crew window and everything 'splodes

 

Edited December 13, 2015 by Berlin
